about.title: Our Story & Mission
about.paragraph1: Mohan Krushi Udyog was founded with a simple yet powerful vision: to create a direct bridge between India's hardworking farmers and quality-conscious consumers.
about.paragraph2: We believe that the best food grains come from farmers who care about their craft, and that families deserve access to the freshest, most nutritious products without the markup of multiple intermediaries.
